downloadTitle: SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) Tutorial Files
downloadDescription: Sample files and lesson packages for the tutorials in the SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) documentation.
detailsSection:
This download contains the sample files and lesson packages for the tutorials in the SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) documentation at Integration Services Tutorials.
  • SSIS How to Create an ETL Package.
  • Deploy Packages with SSIS.
systemRequirementsSection:
Both tutorials require the following software:
  • SQL Server Data Tools (SSDT), or Visual Studio with SQL Server Data Tools. (Download the latest release of SSDT from Download SQL Server Data Tools (SSDT).)
  • SQL Server 2012 or later to host the sample database. (Download a free evaluation or developer edition of SQL Server from SQL Server downloads.)
or additional requirements specific to the individual tutorials, see the introductory page for the tutorial.
installInstructionSection:
1. Download the Zip file that you want and extract its contents.
  2. Use the files as you follow the steps of the corresponding tutorial:
    • SSIS How to Create an ETL Package.
    • Deploy Packages with SSIS.
